title: Atmospheric Waves Experiment (AWE) on the ISS - Mesospheric Temperature Mapper - Swaths - Q line Radiance - Ludger Scherliess (Utah State University)

parameters.name: Radiance_mapped_full
parameters.description: ---> Mapped images. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function alternate_view (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['Radiance']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: Radiance_mapped_movie
parameters.description: ---> Mapped image movie. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function alternate_view (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['Radiance']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: MLCloud
parameters.description: Machine Learning Cloud array - percent cloud chance - plain image
